pr_title: Issue 4975: Replace Loading Cache with Regular Cache

timeline.bodyText: We don't use LoadingCache any more...
timeline.author: pbelgundi

timeline.message: Merge branch 'issue4975' of https://github.com/shiveshr/pravega-1 into issue4975

timeline.bodyText: While I understand the reason for removing Future from the Cache Value, I don't see why we are moving away from auto loading cache entries?
timeline.author: pbelgundi

replies.bodyText:
in that case the cache would need to define the semantics of what we do when the cache load fails if the data is not present or there is a transient error.
this keeps the cache semantics cleaner and abstracted away from what the callers may load into it and how they deal with different errors.
replies.author: shiveshr
